mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_table VALUES( auth_seq.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{authKey}, #{authOption}, 0, null )
mapper.select: SELECT email, auth_key, auth_option, expired, expired_date FROM auth_table WHERE email = #{email} AND expired = 0
SELECT count(email) FROM auth_table WHERE email = #{email} AND expired = 0 AND auth_option = #{authOption}
mapper.update: UPDATE auth_table SET auth_key = #{authKey} WHERE email = #{email} AND auth_option = #{authOption} AND expired = 0
UPDATE auth_table SET expired = 1, expired_date = SYSDATE WHERE email = #{email} AND auth_key = #{authKey} AND auth_option = #{authOption}
